/**
 * A `removeEventListener` ponyfill
 * 
 * @param node the element
 * @param eventName the event name
 * @param handle the handler
 * @param options event options
 */function removeEventListener(node,eventName,handler,options){var capture=options&&typeof options!=='boolean'?options.capture:options;node.removeEventListener(eventName,handler,capture);if(handler.__once){node.removeEventListener(eventName,handler.__once,capture);}}export default removeEventListener;
